Name: Mixed Estate
About the game: The Mixed Estate application is designed to help completely immerse yourself in the design of your housing. VR technology gives you an ability not only inspect the entire house, but also navigate the proposed locations easily, enjoy beautiful views, and the most importantly: you can become a great designer and change the appearance of the apartment yourself. Application features: 1. The choice of really existing locations 2. Ability to customize the lighting settings of the locations 3. Ability to move around the house, with both the help of controllers or with a user-friendly interface 4. High-tech solution for your business, which will give confidence in the choice of housing
Meta Title: Mixed Estate: Nov 2, 2018, Yode Group and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Mixed Estate? Check out the release date (Nov 2, 2018), developer insights from Yode Group, and a complete game summary.
